code: import React from'react';import'./Todo.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Todo=_ref=>{let{todos,removeTodo,toggleComplete,setEditTodo}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"todo-list",children:todos.map(todo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"todo-item ".concat(todo.completed?'completed':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>toggleComplete(todo.id),className:"todo-text",children:todo.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setEditTodo(todo),className:"edit-button",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeTodo(todo.id),className:"delete-button",children:"Delete"})]})]},todo.id))});};export default Todo;
